attributes.action: Save our Bees. Maintain the Neonicotinoids ban on crops, without exception.
attributes.additional_details:
Neonicotinoids are banned in the EU due to links with bee deaths. There is no reason to bring back their use in the UK.

The ban on Neonicotinoids is there for a good reason, countless studies show that this insecticide has a devastating impact on pollinators and other useful insects. The bee emergency is the real emergency, as bees are essential pollinators for a third of our food. This is about species survival and our food security.

Maintain the Neonicotinoids ban, without exception.
attributes.background: Neonicotinoids are a poison that is deadly to bees and other beneficial pollinators.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
